ml.alternet.parser.visit

Interface TraversableRule

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Grammar.Combine.Simplifiable, TraversableRule.CombinedRule, TraversableRule.SimpleRule, TraversableRule.StandaloneRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grammar.AtLeast, Grammar.AtMost, Grammar.Bounds, Grammar.CharToken, Grammar.CharToken.Composed, Grammar.CharToken.Single, Grammar.Choice, Grammar.Combine, Grammar.DropToken, Grammar.EnumToken, Grammar.EnumValueToken, Grammar.GrammarToken, Grammar.Number, Grammar.Optional, Grammar.Proxy, Grammar.Proxy.Deferred, Grammar.Proxy.Named, Grammar.Repeatable, Grammar.Rule, Grammar.Sequence, Grammar.StringToken, Grammar.Token, Grammar.TypedToken, Grammar.TypedToken.Mapper, Grammar.TypedToken.Number, Grammar.TypedToken.String, Grammar.TypedToken.TypedNumber, Grammar.Wrapper, Grammar.ZeroOrMore

    public interface TraversableRule
    This interface is used by Rules in order to traverse them. It exists in 3 flavour : standalone rules, simple rules that host a single nested rule, and combined rules that host several nested rules.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    Grammar.Rule

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TraversableRule.CombinedRule
      Allow to traverse a combined rule, that is to say a rule made of several rules.
      static interface  TraversableRule.SimpleRule
      Allow to traverse the nested rule embedded in this rule.
      static interface  TraversableRule.StandaloneRule
      A standalone rule doesn't embed nested rules.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept(Visitor visitor)
      Accept the given visitor.
      boolean isGrammarField()
      Indicates whether this rule is defined as a field in a grammar.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        void accept(Visitor visitor)
        Accept the given visitor. The visitor hold the state during traversing and is responsible of avoiding infinite loop during recursion.
        Parameters:
        visitor - Allow to visit different kinds of rules.

      • isGrammarField

        boolean isGrammarField()
        Indicates whether this rule is defined as a field in a grammar.
        Returns:
        true if this rule has a name false otherwise.
